name: TV Veterans Trivia Quiz | Characters and Actors | 10 Questions

questions.text: James Garner did well in 'Maverick' and 'Rockford Files', but also had a less successful western series.
Lee Majors did many things other than 'Six Million Dollar Man', including 'Owen Marshall', 'Fall Guy' and 'Big Valley'. Who was his co-star in 'Owen Marshall'?
questions.explanation:
Arthur Hill.

	It was a lawyer show.

questions.text: Beatrice Arthur was successful with 'Maude' and 'Golden Girls', but also had this series that didn't do that well.
questions.explanation:
Amanda's.

	The series came out in 1983 and ten of thirteen episodes tape actually aired. The series was also called "Amanda's by the Sea".

questions.text: Michael Landon scored with 'Bonanza', 'Little House on the Prairie' and 'Highway to Heaven'. Who played his wife in 'Little House'?
questions.explanation:
Karen Grassle.

	All were in the cast.

questions.text: Leonard Nimoy was enormously popular in 'Star Trek', but he also did 'In Search Of' and 'Mission Impossible'. What was his character's name in 'Mission'?
questions.explanation:
Paris.

	All three were good shows.

questions.text: Gene Barry was in 'Name of the Game' and 'Burke's Law', but he also starred in a western.
questions.explanation:
Bat Masterson.

	All were TV westerns.

questions.text: Robert Stack was also in 'Name of the Game', along with 'The Untouchables' and 'Unsolved Mysteries'. What was the name of his unsuccessful police show?
questions.explanation:
Strike Force.

	It didn't quite make it.

questions.text: Susan Saint James also was in 'Name of the Game', along with 'Kate and Allie' and 'McMillan and Wife'. Who played Allie?
Meredith Baxter did 'Family' and 'Family Ties', but had a prior series in 'Bridget Loves Bernie'. Who played Bernie?
Gavin MacLeod did well with 'Mary Tyler Moore' and 'Love Boat', but also had one prior tv series.
